content: @Isaac Vetter do we have example subscription resources for this stream? I'd like to make sure my server does what's required - I think it does - but I won't have time on the day
Hi All, is there a R4 Sandbox that supports both Notifications (both ways) and Subscriptions ?

@Nilesh Pagare what do you mean by both ways? Also, the connectathon stream is over here for subscriptions: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179229-subscriptions/topic/May.202020.20Virtual.20Connectation

Jenni Syed said:

Nilesh Pagare what do you mean by both ways? Also, the connectathon stream is over here for subscriptions: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179229-subscriptions/topic/May.202020.20Virtual.20Connectation

Hi @Jenni Syed - when I say both ways.. I meant a FHIR Server capable of publishing and subscribing events

Jenni Syed said:

Subscribing to another server?

HI @Jenni Syed - here is the scenario image.png
